notes.text:
This really does well against Ninjas when you open up with one of your Cyclones. The main issue I had was against Dakini, I'm glad that's getting nerfed.

My main issue was against 3SD Hazy Flame when they explode and I often found myself using Essidari to hold them back or to get over their bigger monster.

The addition of Wall of Disrespect really worked out for me. Windstorm was decent but I often ended up having it at the worst time, while I found myself loving every second with this card.

I am now a 6th time KoG player and an F2P one at that, and I have all of you to thank for it.

My last duel before I got promoted was a Tea Bamboo and I was on the brink with 500 LP and  it felt good to see them surrender.
